definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
CR Vanguard or China Resources Vanguard Shop, a supermarket chain in Hong Kong and mainland China

sentences.english: Please change here for the CRH Line.
sentences.chinese: 線路變化，在這裏，請華潤集團爲。

sentences.english: We have very good connections with the China Resources Shipping and Storage Co. Ltd. in Hongkong.
sentences.chinese: 我們和香港華潤運輸倉儲有限公司關係很好。

sentences.english: Vanguard is just one of the brands his company controls.
sentences.chinese: 萬家只是華潤控股的品牌之一。

sentences.english: Switched from CRC to MD5 hashes for stronger per-file validation.
sentences.chinese: 從交換的華潤爲MD5哈希更有力的每個文件的驗證。

sentences.english: China Resources Shipping and Storage Co. Ltd. in Hongkong.
sentences.chinese: 我們和香港華潤運輸倉儲有限公司關係很好。

sentences.english: Acting Hong Kong China Resources afterburner senior lubricants.
sentences.chinese: 代理香港華潤加力高級潤滑油。

sentences.english: "Our ambition is for China Resources to be the largest retailer in China, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說“我們的雄心是讓華潤成爲中國最大的零售商。”

definition: Vanke, large Chinese real estate company, founded in 1984
